result.title: Project webpage and logo
result.description: Task PMD 1. Creation of a project webpage and a logo (TUE-1, M1-2) Webpage and project logo. Task PMD 2. Project management and dissemination (all partners, M1-M48) This task accompanies the whole project and guarantees a successful accomplishment of the project. This includes to organize meetings on a regularly basis in order to discuss critical issues and the milestones as well as the storage and exchange of the project data. Furthermore, the results will be disseminated according to the dissemination plan (Chapter 2.2)

result.title: Design Options paper
result.description: To develop the Design Options paper (DOP), partners will perform peer learning activities. Project partners will identify, assess and analyse practices in different areas of access to finance, in their respective countries and present them to the other partners. External experts from different countries with relevant experience will share their insights as well. Selected good practices will be developed in order to prepare them for implementation. The results of the peer-review process will be compiled into the DOP.
